summary: 1999  was a common year starting on Friday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Silver Peak  is a census-designated place in Esmeralda County, Nevada, United States. It lies along State Route 265 south of U.S. Route 6 and west of Goldfield, the county seat of Esmeralda County. Its elevation is 4,321 feet . Although it is unincorporated, it has a post office, with the ZIP code of 89047. The population of Silver Peak is 107 as of 2010.
title: Silver Peak, Nevada
